TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginView extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class LoginView Inherits Control Implements INamingContainer
public ref class LoginView : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer
type LoginView = class inherit Control interface INamingContainer

summary.span: 根據使用者的驗證狀態和角色成員資格，顯示對於指定使用者適當的內容範本。

span.span: Displays the appropriate content template for a given user, based on the user's authentication status and role membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項會顯示不同的網站內容範本 （或 「 檢視 」） 針對不同的使用者，根據是否已驗證使用者，而如果因此，Web 站台角色他或她所屬。The control displays different Web site content templates (or "views") for different users, based on whether the user is authenticated and, if so, which Web site roles he or she belongs to. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中所提供的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)再繼續進行。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱 < [ 使用的成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 範本儲存於屬性會顯示任何使用者尚未登入網站的訪客。The template stored in the property is displayed to any visitor to the Web site who has not logged in. 使用者已登入之後，網站會顯示使用者的角色中的其中一個相關聯的範本屬性或在指定的預設範本屬性。Once a user is logged in, the site displays either a template associated with one of the user's roles in the property or the default template specified in the property. 控制項可讓您管理各種範本之間切換，一旦您將範本指派給任何的三個範本屬性類別：The control manages switching among the various templates once you assign templates to any of the three template properties of the class: - -指定要顯示使用者無法登入網站的範本。 - Specifies the template to display to users who are not logged in to the Web site. 登入的使用者永遠不會看到此範本。Users who are logged in will never see this template. - -指定要顯示給使用者登入網站，但不是屬於任何角色群組，以定義的範本的預設範本。 - Specifies the default template to display to users who are logged in to the Web site but do not belong to any role groups with defined templates. - -指定登入的使用者定義的角色群組樣板與角色的成員顯示的樣板。 - Specifies the template to display to logged-in users who are members of roles with defined role-group templates. 內容範本是與特定集合中的角色相關聯執行個體。Content templates are associated with particular sets of roles in instances. 在來源中定義的順序搜尋的角色群組樣板。Role-group templates are searched in the order they are defined in the source. 第一個相符的角色群組範本會顯示給使用者。The first matching role-group template is displayed to the user. 如果使用者是多個角色的成員，則會使用與任何使用者的角色相符的第一個角色群組範本。If a user is a member of more than one role, the first role-group template that matches any of the user's roles is used. 如果多個範本是與單一角色相關聯，則會使用只有第一個定義的範本。If more than one template is associated with a single role, only the first defined template is used. 下表描述的行為控制各種組合的範本使用時。The following table describes the behavior of the control when various combinations of templates are used. |LoggedIn Template 屬性LoggedIn Template Property|匿名的 Template 屬性Anonymous Template Property|Kolekci RoleGroups 屬性RoleGroups Property|LoginView 行為LoginView behavior| |--------------------------------|---------------------------------|-------------------------|------------------------| |未設定Not set|未設定Not set|未設定Not set|不顯示任何內容。Displays no content.| |設定Set|未設定Not set|未設定Not set|只有當使用者登入時，會顯示內容。Displays content only when the user is logged in.| |未設定Not set|設定Set|未設定Not set|只有當使用者未登入時，會顯示內容。Displays content only when the user is not logged in.| |未設定Not set|未設定Not set|設定Set|顯示的第一個範本符合其中一個使用者角色的集合。Displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果找到相符項目，則會顯示任何內容。If no match is found, displays no content.| |設定Set|設定Set|未設定Not set|如果使用者登入，就會顯示在指定的範本屬性。If the user is logged in, displays the template specified in the property. 如果在使用者未登入，會顯示範本中指定屬性。If the user in not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| |設定Set|設定Set|設定Set|如果使用者登入，就會顯示的第一個範本符合其中一個使用者角色的集合。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果找到相符項目，則會顯示範本中指定屬性。If no match is found, displays the template specified in the property. 如果使用者未登入，會顯示範本中指定屬性。If the user is not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| |設定Set|未設定Not set|設定Set|如果使用者登入，就會顯示的第一個範本符合其中一個使用者角色的集合。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果找到相符項目，則會顯示範本中指定屬性。If no match is found, displays the template specified in the property. 如果使用者未登入，則不會顯示任何內容。If the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| |未設定Not set|設定Set|設定Set|如果使用者登入，就會顯示的第一個範本符合其中一個使用者角色的集合。If the user is logged in, displays the first template in the collection that matches one of the user's roles. 如果找到相符項目，則不會顯示任何內容。If no match is found, nothing is displayed. 如果使用者未登入，會顯示範本中指定屬性。If the user is not logged in, displays the template specified in the property.| 並可以搭配設定任何驗證結構描述屬性物件的屬性。The and can be used with any authentication scheme that sets the property of the object's property. 您必須設定要使用的角色管理屬性來定義基底範本，在網站上的使用者角色。You must configure role management to use the property to define templates base on the user's role on the Web site. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 認識角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). 方法才會將網頁的初始焦點控制項，或任何其子控制項。The method does not set the initial focus of the Web page to the control, or any of its child controls. 中所包含的控制項控制項之後，會建立事件。Controls contained in the control are created after the event. 若要將焦點設定為所包含的子控制項，處理`On_PreRender`，並呼叫其方法。To set the focus to a child control contained by the , handle the `On_PreRender` and call its method. 您也可以使用並以程式設計方式存取中的控制項事件控制項範本。You can also use the and events to programmatically access the controls in the control templates. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定每個所支援的三個範本類型的範本控制項。The following code example shows how to set templates for each of the three template types supported by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewClass/CS/loginviewclasscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewClass/VB/loginviewclassvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 控制項的新執行個體。

.property instance class System.Web.UI.ITemplate AnonymousTemplate

summary.span: 取得或設定要針對尚未登入網站之使用者顯示的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to display to users who are not logged in to the Web site.
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定當使用者未登入網站時，對網站使用者顯示的內容樣板。The property specifies the content template to display to Web site users when they are not logged in to the Web site. 這個範本會顯示當的屬性屬性是`null`。This template is displayed when the property of the property is `null`. 範本永遠不會顯示已驗證的使用者。The template is never displayed to authenticated users. 如果屬性是空的不登入的使用者顯示任何內容。If the property is empty, no content is displayed to users who are not logged in. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用範本中指定樣板來顯示邀請註冊個人化服務。The following code example uses the template specified in the template to display an invitation to sign up for personalized services. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/CS/loginviewanonymoustemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/VB/loginviewanonymoustemplatevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Creates the child controls that make up the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立個別的控制項構成控制項。The method creates the individual controls that make up the control. 建立的控制項集合會根據使用者的顯示內容的範本而有所不同。The set of controls created varies according to the content template displayed for the user. 例如，當使用者未登入網站，只將範本中包含的控制項中指定建立屬性。For example, when a user is not logged in to the Web site, only the controls contained in the template specified in the property are created.

summary.span: 繫結資料來源至 以及其所有子控制項。

span.span: Binds a data source to and all its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以將資料從一個來源繫結控制項和其子系。Use the method to bind data from a source to the control and its children. 這個方法會解析中的所有資料繫結運算式控制項和任何子控制項中現用的樣板。This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the control and any child controls in the active template.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出主題是否可以套用至 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes can be applied to the control.
to use themes; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否啟用佈景主題，以供控制項。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 是否已啟用中所包含之控制項的佈景主題，屬性也會影響其集合。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its collection. 當屬性是`true`，應用程式的佈景主題目錄中搜尋要套用控制面板。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果任何特定的控制項外觀的佈景主題目錄中，將不套用的外觀。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 時屬性是`false`，則不會搜尋佈景主題目錄的內容屬性不會使用。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property are not used. 控制項可以覆寫設定其父控制項或包含頁面的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control, or the containing page. 比方說，如果父控制項的設定為`false`，您可以選擇性地將佈景主題套用至所設定包含在父系的子控制項屬性設`true`個別子控制項。For example, if a parent control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the parent by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

summary.span: 取得或設定樣板，這個樣板會針對已登入網站，但不屬於 屬性所指定其中一個角色群組之成員的網站使用者顯示。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to display to Web site users who are logged in to the Web site but are not members of one of the role groups specified in the property.
The to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這兩個下列條件符合時，將會顯示網站使用者的屬性：The property is displayed to Web site users when both of the following conditions are met: - 的屬性屬性不是 `null`The property of the property is not `null` - 使用者不屬於定義的角色群組屬性。The user does not belong to a role group defined in the property. 屬性會指定已驗證的網站使用者的預設範本。The property specifies a default template for authenticated Web site users. 如果您未設定角色管理是唯一的範本適用於已驗證的使用者。If you have not configured role management, the is the only template available for authenticated users. 如需有關如何設定角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 認識角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information about configuring role management, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用範本，以顯示登入的使用者個人化資訊的連結。The following code example uses the template to display links to personalized information for logged-in users. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/CS/loginviewanonymoustemplatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewAnonymousTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewAnonymousTemplate/VB/loginviewanonymoustemplatevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行初始化控制項。The method performs initialization for the control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);
override this.OnPreRender : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 根據登入使用者的角色，判斷要顯示的角色群組樣板。

span.span: Determines which role-group template to display, based on the roles of the logged-in user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫期間事件，以判斷要向使用者顯示的內容範本。The method is called during the event to determine which content template to display to the user. 如果的屬性屬性是`null`，在指定的範本屬性會顯示; 否則會顯示使用者的角色相關聯的範本。If the property of the property is `null`, the template specified in the property is displayed; otherwise, the template associated with the user's role is displayed. 如果使用者不屬於定義的角色群組，或如果您未設定角色管理控制項會顯示在指定的範本屬性。If the user does not belong to a defined role group, or if you have not configured role management, the control displays the template specified in the property. 如需有關如何設定角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 角色管理提供者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71ddd651-5f91-471b-ad9f-61249b0bf0d5)。For more information about configuring role management, see [Role Management Providers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/71ddd651-5f91-471b-ad9f-61249b0bf0d5). 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

summary.span: 在 控制項切換檢視之後，引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event after the control switches views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項切換檢視，從先前的範本中移除控制項，並從新的範本建立新的子控制項。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 方法建立新的子控制項之後呼叫。The method is called after the new child controls are created. 使用方法，以執行任何處理，例如繫結，初始化新的檢視上的控制項所需的資料。Use the method to perform any processing, such as data binding, necessary to initialize the controls on the new view. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 在 控制項切換檢視之前，引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event before the control switches views.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項切換檢視，從先前的範本中移除控制項，並從新的範本建立新的子控制項。When the controls switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 移除先前的控制項之前，呼叫方法。The method is called before the previous controls are removed. 使用方法，以執行任何必要的處理，例如儲存控制資訊之前移除控制項。Use the method to perform any necessary processing, such as saving control information, before the controls are removed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Renders the Web server control content to the client's browser using the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來呈現伺服器控制項內容，以使用指定的用戶端瀏覽器物件。The method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified object. **附註**這個方法主要由控制項開發人員用來擴充控制項。**Note** This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection RoleGroups { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection RoleGroups
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property RoleGroups As RoleGroupCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::RoleGroupCollection ^ RoleGroups { System::Web::UI::WebControls::RoleGroupCollection ^ get(); };
member this.RoleGroups : System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroupCollection

summary.span: 取得將內容樣板與特定角色建立關聯的角色群組集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of role groups that associate content templates with particular roles.

value.span: 物件，含有已定義的角色群組樣板。

span.span: A object that contains the defined role-group templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含在網站上的各種角色相關聯的內容範本。The property contains the content templates associated with various roles on the Web site. 中的集合屬性搜尋的來源中定義範本的順序。The collection in the property is searched in the order in which templates are defined in the source. 第一個相符的角色群組範本會顯示給使用者。The first matching role-group template is displayed to the user. 如果使用者是多個角色的成員，則會使用與任何使用者的角色相符的第一個角色群組範本。If a user is a member of more than one role, the first role-group template that matches any of the user's roles is used. 如果多個範本是與單一角色相關聯，則將使用只有第一個定義的範本。If more than one template is associated with a single role, only the first defined template will be used. 如果登入的使用者不屬於任何角色群組集合中包含的角色，網站會顯示在指定的內容範本屬性。If a logged-in user does not belong to any role contained in the role-group collection, the site displays the content template specified in the property. 匿名使用者永遠不會顯示包含在任何範本集合。Anonymous users are never shown any template contained in the collection. 您必須設定要使用的角色管理屬性來定義範本，根據在網站上的使用者角色。You must configure role management to use the property to define templates based on the user's role on the Web site. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 認識角色管理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)。For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合。The following code example demonstrates using the collection. 因為和屬性並未設定，只有以使用者屬於角色定義的內容樣板與顯示內容。Because the and properties are not set, the content is displayed only to users who belong to roles with a defined content template. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginViewRoleGroups#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewRoleGroups/CS/loginviewrolegroupscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginViewRoleGroups#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginViewRoleGroups/VB/loginviewrolegroupsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SkinID { get; set; }
.property instance string SkinID
Public Overrides Property SkinID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SkinID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SkinID : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用至 控制項的面板。

span.span: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.

value.span: 要套用至 控制項的面板名稱。

span.span: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 面板控制項可以使用包含在一或多個面板檔案中的佈景主題的目錄。Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory. 屬性會指定其中一個這些要套用至控制項的面板。The property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control. 面板是專屬於特定的控制;您無法共用之間的不同類型的控制項的外觀設定。A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types. 如果您未設定屬性，控制會使用預設面板如果有定義。If you do not set the property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined. 例如，如果沒有面板識別碼定義控制項，則該外觀套用至所有控制，未明確參考識別碼的外觀，而且，不會設定為停用佈景主題。For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies to all controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable theming. 如果已定義識別碼的外觀控制項，則該面板只適用於控制項設為該識別碼。If a skin with an ID is defined for an control, then that skin applies only to controls whose is set to that ID. 如果佈景主題目錄中的面板檔案未包含具有指定的外觀、在執行階段擲回例外狀況。If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified , an exception is thrown at run time.

exception.span: 屬性中指定的面板不存在主題中。

span.span: The skin specified in the property does not exist in the theme.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ViewChanged;
.event class System.EventHandler ViewChanged
Public Custom Event ViewChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ViewChanged;
member this.ViewChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 在檢視變更之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the view is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項切換檢視，從先前的範本中移除控制項，並從新的範本建立新的子控制項。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 之後建立新的子控制項，會引發事件。The event is raised after the new child controls are created. 使用執行任何處理，例如資料繫結，初始化新的檢視上的控制項所需的事件。Use the event to perform any processing, such as data binding, necessary to initialize the controls on the new view. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用者的登入狀態變更在回傳至頁面時，才會引發事件。The event is only raised if the login status for a user changes during a postback to the page. 如果使用者登入使用，不會引發事件控制項，或如果使用者登出使用控制項。The event will not be raised if a user logs in using the control, or if the user logs out using the control. 事件也不會發生在使用者已登入或出後面接著重新導向。The event will also not occur if a user is logged in or out followed by a redirect. 舉例說明何時便會發生事件時，使用者登出藉由呼叫不會重新導向至其他頁面的方法。An example of when the event will occur is when a user is logged out by calling the method without being redirected to another page. 到頁面上，在下一個回傳控制項將會偵測使用者的登入狀態中的變更，然後再引發事件。During the next postback to the page, the control will detect the change in the login status for the user, and then raise the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler ViewChanging;
.event class System.EventHandler ViewChanging
Public Custom Event ViewChanging As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ ViewChanging;
member this.ViewChanging : EventHandler

summary.span: 在檢視變更之前發生。

span.span: Occurs before the view is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項切換檢視，從先前的範本中移除控制項，並從新的範本建立新的子控制項。When the control switches views, it removes the controls from the previous template and creates new child controls from the new template. 移除先前的控制項之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before the previous controls are removed. 使用事件來執行任何處理，例如控制項移除之前，儲存所需的控制項資訊。Use the event to perform any processing, such as saving control information, necessary before the controls are removed. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用者的登入狀態變更在回傳至頁面時，才會引發事件。The event is only raised if the login status for a user changes during a postback to the page. 如果使用者登入使用，不會引發事件控制項，或如果使用者登出使用控制項。The event will not be raised if a user logs in using the control, or if the user logs out using the control. 事件也不會發生在使用者已登入或出後面接著重新導向。The event will also not occur if a user is logged in or out followed by a redirect. 舉例說明何時便會發生事件時，使用者登出藉由呼叫不會重新導向至其他頁面的方法。An example of when the event will occur is when a user is logged out by calling the method without being redirected to another page. 到頁面上，在下一個回傳控制項將會偵測使用者的登入狀態中的變更，然後再引發事件。During the next postback to the page, the control will detect the change in the login status for the user, and then raise the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
